name: Pepelon
description: What is Pepelon? Launched in 13/5/2023 by a team based in Pepe Land, Pepelon was birthed to highlight the collaboration between Elon Musk and Pepe. Two people on the same mission to Mars. Pepelon is here to bring back the hype which memecoins always deserved. Zero taxes, LP locked and contract renounced so that $PEPELON is a coin for the people, forever. As the say goes, missed $DOGELON and $PEPE? Make sure not to do the same with $PEPELON. Pepe and Elon join forces on an epic space odyssey to colonize Mars. An unforgettable Mars mission with the most memeable memecoin in existence.
